Tasks.Task Description: Identify the specific monitoring and diagnostic needs for the network, including traffic analysis, connection troubleshooting, and packet capture requirements.
Activate Network Watcher in the Azure portal for the required regions. Ensure it is enabled for all virtual networks that need monitoring.
Set up diagnostic tools such as Connection Monitor, Packet Capture, and IP Flow Verify to monitor and troubleshoot network issues.
Ensure that access to Network Watcher is restricted using Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). Configure logging and encryption for diagnostic data.
Configure alerts for network anomalies and performance metrics using Azure Monitor and Network Watcher integration.
Perform tests using Network Watcher tools to ensure proper functionality and validate configurations.
Create detailed documentation of the Network Watcher setup, including configurations, monitoring tools, and troubleshooting procedures.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on using Network Watcher tools and interpreting diagnostic data.
Schedule regular audits to ensure Network Watcher configurations are up-to-date and aligned with organizational policies.
Periodically review and update Network Watcher configurations to accommodate changes in the network architecture or monitoring requirements.
